section ‹Models›

subsubsection ‹Type›

debt_axiomatization sem_int_T :: ‹nat ⇒ TY›
  where 𝗂𝗇𝗍_neq_𝗉𝗈𝗂𝗌𝗈𝗇': ‹sem_int_T b ≠ 𝗉𝗈𝗂𝗌𝗈𝗇›

definition ‹mk_int_T = sem_int_T o len0_class.len_of›

lemma 𝗂𝗇𝗍_neq_𝗉𝗈𝗂𝗌𝗈𝗇[simp]:
  ‹mk_int_T b ≠ 𝗉𝗈𝗂𝗌𝗈𝗇›
  ‹𝗉𝗈𝗂𝗌𝗈𝗇 ≠ mk_int_T b›
  unfolding mk_int_T_def
  by (simp_all add: 𝗂𝗇𝗍_neq_𝗉𝗈𝗂𝗌𝗈𝗇', metis 𝗂𝗇𝗍_neq_𝗉𝗈𝗂𝗌𝗈𝗇' comp_apply)

syntax "_int_semty_" :: ‹type ⇒ TY› ("int'(_')")
       "_int_semty_" :: ‹type ⇒ TY› ("𝗂𝗇𝗍'(_')")

(*translations "int('b)" => "CONST mk_int_T (CONST Pure.type :: 'b itself)" *)

ML ‹local open Ast in
  fun need_add_sort (Appl [Constant \<^syntax_const>‹_ofsort›, Variable _, _]) = true
    | need_add_sort (Variable _) = true
    | need_add_sort _ = false
  fun add_sort X =
    if need_add_sort X
    then Appl [Constant \<^syntax_const>‹_ofsort›, X, Constant \<^class_syntax>‹len›]
    else X
end›

parse_ast_translation ‹
  let open Ast
   in [(\<^syntax_const>‹_int_semty_›, (fn _ => fn [V] =>
          Appl [Constant \<^const_syntax>‹mk_int_T›, Appl [Constant \<^syntax_const>‹_TYPE›, add_sort V]]))] end›

print_translation ‹
  let
    fun len_of_itself_tr' ctxt [Const (\<^const_syntax>‹Pure.type›, Type (_, [T]))] =
      Syntax.const \<^syntax_const>‹_int_semty_› $ Syntax_Phases.term_of_typ ctxt T
  in [(\<^const_syntax>‹mk_int_T›, len_of_itself_tr')] end
›

syntax BITS_syntax :: "type ⇒ logic" ("BITS'(_')")

parse_ast_translation ‹
  let open Ast
   in [(\<^syntax_const>‹BITS_syntax›, (fn _ => fn [V] =>
          Appl [Constant \<^syntax_const>‹_TYPE›, add_sort V]))] end›


typedecl 𝗂𝗇𝗍 ― ‹size of address space›

consts 𝗂𝗇𝗍_bits :: "nat" ― ‹bit width of address space, in unit of bits›
specification (𝗂𝗇𝗍_bits) 𝗂𝗇𝗍_bits_L0: "0 < 𝗂𝗇𝗍_bits" by blast
  ― ‹We leave it unspecified and only require it is positive›


instantiation 𝗂𝗇𝗍 :: len begin
definition "len_of_𝗂𝗇𝗍 (_::𝗂𝗇𝗍 itself) = 𝗂𝗇𝗍_bits"
instance by (standard, simp add: 𝗂𝗇𝗍_bits_L0 len_of_𝗂𝗇𝗍_def)
end

abbreviation ‹𝗂𝗇𝗍 ≡ 𝗂𝗇𝗍(𝗂𝗇𝗍)›

lemma [φreason add]:
  ‹ Is_Type_Literal 𝗂𝗇𝗍('a) ›
  unfolding Is_Type_Literal_def ..


subsubsection ‹Semantics›

debt_axiomatization sem_mk_int   :: ‹nat × nat ⇒ VAL›
                and sem_dest_int :: ‹VAL ⇒ nat × nat›
where sem_mk_dest_int[simp]: ‹sem_dest_int (sem_mk_int bits_val) = bits_val›
  and WT_int[simp]: ‹Well_Type (sem_int_T b)     = { sem_mk_int (b,x)    |x. x < 2 ^ b } ›
  and can_eqcmp_int[simp]: "Can_EqCompare res (sem_mk_int (b1,x1)) (sem_mk_int (b2,x2)) ⟷ b1 = b2"
  and eqcmp_int[simp]: "EqCompare (sem_mk_int i1) (sem_mk_int i2) ⟷ i1 = i2"
  and  zero_int[simp]: ‹Zero (sem_int_T b)    = Some (sem_mk_int (b,0))›
  and φSem_machine_int_to_logic_nat[simp]: ‹φSem_int_to_logic_nat (sem_mk_int (b,x)) = Some (of_nat x)›
  and φSem_machine_int_to_logic_int[simp]:
        ‹φSem_int_to_logic_int (sem_mk_int (b,x)) = Some (if x < 2^(b - 1) then of_nat x
                                                          else - of_nat (2^b - x))›

lemma sem_mk_int_inj[simp]:
  ‹ sem_mk_int i = sem_mk_int j ≡ i = j ›
  by (smt (verit, ccfv_SIG) sem_mk_dest_int)
  

lemma [φreason %logical_spec_of_semantics]:
  ‹get_logical_int_from_semantic_int (sem_mk_int (b,x) ⦂ Itself) (if x < 2^(b - 1) then of_nat x else - of_nat (2^b - x))›
  unfolding get_logical_int_from_semantic_int_def
  by simp

lemma [φreason %logical_spec_of_semantics]:
  ‹get_logical_nat_from_semantic_int (sem_mk_int (b,x) ⦂ Itself) x›
  unfolding get_logical_nat_from_semantic_int_def
  by simp

section ‹φ-Types›

text ‹Thresholds between φ-Types
▪ 9 ‹Word ⟶ ℤ⇧r›
▪ 9 ‹Word ⟶ ℕ›
▪ 9 ‹Word ⟶ ℤ›
▪ 7 ‹ℤ⇧r ⟶ Word›
▪ 7 ‹ℕ ⟶ Word›
▪ 7 ‹ℤ ⟶ Word›
▪ 6 ‹ℤ ⟶ ℕ›
▪ 5 ‹ℕ ⟶ ℤ›
▪ 4 ‹ℤ⇧r ⟶ ℕ›
▪ 2 ‹ℕ ⟶ ℕ⇧r›

There is no direct transformation between ‹ℕ⇧r› and ‹ℤ› because of complexity in the expression.

›

subsection ‹Words›

φtype_def Word :: ‹'b itself ⇒ (VAL, 'b::len word) φ›
  where ‹x ⦂ Word _ ≡ sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b), unat x) ⦂ Itself›
  deriving Basic
       and Abstract_Domain⇩L
       and ‹Object_Equiv (Word ?uu) (=)›
       and ‹𝗍𝗒𝗉𝖾𝗈𝖿 (Word TYPE('b)) = int('b)›
       and ‹Semantic_Zero_Val int('b) (Word ?uu) (0::'b::len word)›
       and Inhabited

syntax Word_syntax :: "type ⇒ (VAL, 'b::len word) φ" ("Word'(_')")

translations "Word('x)" <= "CONST Word TYPE('x)"

parse_ast_translation ‹
  let open Ast
   in [(\<^syntax_const>‹Word_syntax›, (fn _ => fn [V] =>
          Appl [Constant \<^const_syntax>‹Word›, Appl [Constant \<^syntax_const>‹_TYPE›, add_sort V]]))] end›

declare [[φreason_default_pattern
      ‹_ ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (Word _)› ⇒
      ‹_ ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (Word _)›    (200)
  and ‹?x ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ Word _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫› ⇒
      ‹?x ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ Word _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫›    (200)]]

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  "φEqual Word('b) (λx y. True) (=)"
  unfolding φEqual_def by (simp add: word_unat_eq_iff)



subsection ‹Natural Numbers›

subsubsection ‹Rounded Natural Number›

φtype_def φRoundedNat :: "'b::len itself ⇒ (VAL, nat) φ"
  where ‹x ⦂ φRoundedNat _ ≡ ((of_nat x :: 'b word) ⦂ Word('b))›
  deriving Basic
       and Abstract_Domain⇩L
       and ‹Object_Equiv (φRoundedNat (TY::'b::len itself)) (λx y. x mod 2^LENGTH('b) = y mod 2^LENGTH('b))›
       and ‹𝗍𝗒𝗉𝖾𝗈𝖿 (φRoundedNat (TYPE('a))) = 𝗂𝗇𝗍('a)›
       and ‹Semantic_Zero_Val int('b) (φRoundedNat TYPE('b)) 0›
       and Inhabited

syntax φRoundedNat_syntax :: "type ⇒ (VAL, nat) φ" ("ℕ⇧r'(_')")

translations "ℕ⇧r('x)" <= "CONST φRoundedNat TYPE('x)"

parse_ast_translation ‹
  let open Ast
   in [(\<^syntax_const>‹φRoundedNat_syntax›, (fn _ => fn [V] =>
          Appl [Constant \<^const_syntax>‹φRoundedNat›,
                Appl [Constant \<^syntax_const>‹_TYPE›, add_sort V]]))] end›

declare [[φreason_default_pattern
      ‹_ ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (φRoundedNat _)› ⇒
      ‹_ ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (φRoundedNat _)›    (200)
  and ‹?x ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ φRoundedNat _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫 › ⇒
      ‹?x ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ φRoundedNat _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫 ›    (200) ]]


declare φRoundedNat.elim[condition ‹Threshold_Cost 7›,
                         φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹_ ⦂ ℕ⇧r(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ Word(_) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫›]

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹x ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 y ⦂ Word('b) 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 y. y = (of_nat x :: 'b::len word) @tag to Word('b)›
  ❴  ❵.
 
lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹ Threshold_Cost 9
⟹ x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 unat x ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b)›
  for x :: ‹'b::len word›
  ❴ ‹unat x ⦂ MAKE _ (ℕ⇧r('b))› ❵ .

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹ x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 unat x ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b) @tag to ℕ⇧r('b)›
  for x :: ‹'b::len word› ❴ ❵.

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  "φEqual (ℕ⇧r('b::len)) (λx y. True) (λx y. x mod 2^LENGTH('b) = y mod 2^LENGTH('b))"
  ❴ to ‹Word('b)› ❵
      certified by (metis the_φlemmata unat_eq_of_nat unat_lt2p unat_of_nat)  .


subsubsection ‹Natural Number›

φtype_def φNat :: "'b::len itself ⇒ (VAL, nat) φ"
  where ‹x ⦂ φNat _ ≡ (x ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b) 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 x ∈ {0..< 2 ^ LENGTH('b)})›
  deriving Basic
       and Abstract_Domain⇩L
       and ‹Object_Equiv (φNat uu) (=)›
       and Inhabited

syntax φNat_syntax :: "type ⇒ (VAL, nat) φ" ("ℕ'(_')")

translations "ℕ('x)" <= "CONST φNat TYPE('x)"

parse_ast_translation ‹
  let open Ast
   in [(\<^syntax_const>‹φNat_syntax›, (fn _ => fn [V] =>
          Appl [Constant \<^const_syntax>‹φNat›, Appl [Constant \<^syntax_const>‹_TYPE›, add_sort V]]))] end›

declare [[φreason_default_pattern
      ‹_ ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (φNat _)› ⇒
      ‹_ ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (φNat _)›    (200)
  and ‹?x ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ φNat _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫 › ⇒
      ‹?x ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ φNat _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫 ›    (200) ]]

let_φtype φNat
  deriving ‹ 𝗍𝗒𝗉𝖾𝗈𝖿 ℕ('b) = 𝗂𝗇𝗍('b) ›
       and ‹Semantic_Zero_Val int('b) ℕ('b) 0›

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹ Threshold_Cost 2
⟹ x ⦂ ℕ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 x ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 x < 2 ^ LENGTH('b)›
  ❴ φNat.elim ❵.

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹x ⦂ ℕ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 y ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b) 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 y. y = x ∧ x < 2 ^ LENGTH('b) @tag to ℕ⇧r('b)›
  ❴ ❵.

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹ x ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 y ⦂ ℕ('b) 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 y. y = x mod 2 ^ LENGTH('b) @tag to ℕ('b)›
  ❴ 
    ‹x mod 2 ^ LENGTH('b) ⦂ MAKE _ (ℕ('b))›
  ❵.

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹ Threshold_Cost 4
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 x mod 2 ^ LENGTH('b) = y
⟹ x ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 y ⦂ ℕ('b) ›
  ❴ to ‹ℕ(_)› ❵.

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut for ‹_ ⦂ ℕ(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ Word(_) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫›]:
  ‹ Threshold_Cost 7
⟹ x ⦂ ℕ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 of_nat x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 x < 2 ^ LENGTH('b) @tag 𝒯𝒫›
  for y :: ‹'b::len word›
  ❴ to ‹ℕ⇧r(_)› ❵.

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹x ⦂ ℕ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 (of_nat x :: 'b::len word) ⦂ Word('b) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 x < 2 ^ LENGTH('b) @tag to Word('b)›
  ❴ ❵.

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹ Threshold_Cost 9
⟹ x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 unat x ⦂ ℕ('b)›
  for x :: ‹'b::len word›
  ❴ to ‹ℕ⇧r('b)› ❵.

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹ x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 unat x ⦂ ℕ('b) @tag to ℕ('b)›
  for x :: ‹'b::len word› ❴ ❵.

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  "φEqual (ℕ('b::len)) (λx y. True) (=)"
  ❴ to ‹Word('b)› ❵ certified using φlemmata of_nat_inverse by blast .

lemma [φreason %logical_spec_of_semantics]:
  ‹get_logical_int_from_semantic_int (n ⦂ ℕ('b::len))
        (if n < 2^(LENGTH('b) - 1) then of_nat n else - of_nat (2^LENGTH('b) - n))›
  unfolding get_logical_int_from_semantic_int_def Ball_def
  by (clarsimp; metis uint_nat unat_of_nat_len)

lemma [φreason %logical_spec_of_semantics]:
  ‹get_logical_nat_from_semantic_int (n ⦂ ℕ('b::len)) n›
  unfolding get_logical_nat_from_semantic_int_def Ball_def
  by (clarsimp simp add: unat_of_nat_len)


subsection ‹Integers›

subsubsection ‹Integer›

φtype_def φInt :: "'b::len itself ⇒ (VAL, int) φ"
  where ‹x ⦂ φInt _ ≡ ((of_int x :: 'b word) ⦂ Word('b)
                              𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 x ∈ { -(2^(LENGTH('b)-1)) ..< 2^(LENGTH('b)-1)})›
  deriving Basic
       and Abstract_Domain⇩L
       and ‹Object_Equiv (φInt uu) (=)›
       and ‹ 𝗍𝗒𝗉𝖾𝗈𝖿(φInt TYPE('a)) = 𝗂𝗇𝗍('a) ›
       and Inhabited

syntax φInt_syntax :: "type ⇒ (VAL, nat) φ" ("ℤ'(_')")

translations "ℤ('x)" == "CONST φInt TYPE('x)"

parse_ast_translation ‹
  let open Ast
   in [(\<^syntax_const>‹φInt_syntax›, (fn _ => fn [V] =>
          Appl [Constant \<^const_syntax>‹φInt›, Appl [Constant \<^syntax_const>‹_TYPE›, add_sort V]]))] end›

let_φtype φInt
  deriving ‹Semantic_Zero_Val int('b) ℤ('b) 0›

declare φInt.expansion[simp del, φexpns del]

lemma φInt_expn[simp, φexpns]:
  ‹p ⊨ (n ⦂ ℤ('b)) ⟷ p = sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b), (if 0 ≤ n then nat n else nat (2^LENGTH('b) + n)))
          ∧ n < 2 ^ (LENGTH('b) - 1) ∧ - (2 ^ (LENGTH('b) - 1)) ≤ n›
  unfolding φInt.expansion
  by (auto,
      smt (verit) of_int_0 sint_ge sint_int_max_plus_1 sint_of_int_eq two_less_eq_exp_length unat_eq_nat_uint word_of_int_2p_len word_of_int_inverse,
      smt (verit, ccfv_SIG) diff_Suc_less len_gt_0 uint_power_lower unat_eq_nat_uint unsigned_less word_of_int_inverse,
      smt (verit, ccfv_SIG) More_Word.power_not_zero Word.of_nat_unat diff_Suc_less int_eq_iff len_gt_0 of_int_add power_increasing_iff power_overflow word_of_int_0 word_of_int_2p_len word_of_int_inverse,
      smt (verit, ccfv_SIG) diff_less le_less len_gt_0 lessI of_int_add power_increasing_iff unat_eq_nat_uint word_arith_wis(7) word_of_int_2p_len word_of_int_inverse)

hide_fact φInt.expansion

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹_ ⦂ ℤ(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ Word(_) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫›]:
  " Threshold_Cost 7
⟹ x ⦂ ℤ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 of_int x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 x ∈ { -(2^(LENGTH('b)-1)) ..< 2^(LENGTH('b)-1)}  @tag 𝒯𝒫"
  ❴ φInt.elim ❵ .


lemma [
  φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹_ ⦂ ℤ(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to Word(_)›
]:
  ‹x ⦂ ℤ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 (of_int x :: 'b::len word) ⦂ Word('b) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 x ∈ { -(2^(LENGTH('b)-1)) ..< 2^(LENGTH('b)-1)}
   @tag to Word('b)›
  ❴ ❵ .

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹?x ⦂ Word(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ ℤ(_) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫›]:
  " Threshold_Cost 9
⟹ x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 sint x ⦂ ℤ('b) @tag 𝒯𝒫"
  for x :: ‹'b::len word›
  ❴ ‹sint x ⦂ MAKE _ (ℤ('b))›
    certified using sint_greater_eq sint_less by blast
  ❵.

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹_ ⦂ Word(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (Word _)›]:
  ‹ x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 sint x ⦂ ℤ('b) @tag to Word('b) ›
  ❴ ❵.
 
lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹_ ⦂ ℤ(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (φNat _)›]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 0 ≤ x ∧ x < 2 ^ (LENGTH('b)-1)
⟹ x ⦂ ℤ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 nat x ⦂ ℕ('b) @tag to ℕ('b)›
  ❴ to ‹Word('b)› ❵
    certified by (smt (verit, best) ‹0 ≤ x ∧ x < 2 ^ (LENGTH('b) - 1)› sint_of_int_eq unat_eq_nat_uint word_arith_wis(7) word_of_int_2p_len word_of_int_inverse zero_less_power) .


lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹_ ⦂ ℤ(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ ℕ(_) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫›]:
  ‹ Threshold_Cost 6
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 0 ≤ x ∧ x < 2 ^ (LENGTH('b)-1)
⟹ x ⦂ ℤ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 nat x ⦂ ℕ('b) @tag 𝒯𝒫›
  ❴ to ‹ℕ('b)› ❵.

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹_ ⦂ ℕ(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to ℤ(_)›]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 x < 2 ^ (LENGTH('b)-1)
⟹ x ⦂ ℕ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 of_nat x ⦂ ℤ('b) @tag to ℤ(_) ›
  ❴ to ‹Word('b)› ❵ certified by auto_sledgehammer .

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹_ ⦂ ℕ(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ ℤ(_) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫 ›]:
  ‹ Threshold_Cost 5
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 x < 2 ^ (LENGTH('b)-1)
⟹ x ⦂ ℕ('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 of_nat x ⦂ ℤ('b) @tag 𝒯𝒫 ›
  ❴ to ‹ℤ(_)› ❵.

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  "φEqual ℤ('b) (λx y. True) (=)"
  ❴ to ‹Word(_)› ❵
      certified by (metis One_nat_def atLeastLessThan_iff the_φlemmata signed_take_bit_int_eq_self_iff sint_sbintrunc') .

lemma [φreason %logical_spec_of_semantics]:
  ‹get_logical_int_from_semantic_int (n ⦂ ℤ('b::len)) n›
  unfolding get_logical_int_from_semantic_int_def Ball_def
  apply (auto simp add: One_nat_def[symmetric] not_le  simp del: One_nat_def)
  subgoal premises prems proof -
    have ‹n < 2 ^ (LENGTH('b) - 1) - 2 ^ LENGTH('b)›
      using prems(3) by force
    then have ‹n < 2 ^ (LENGTH('b) - 1) - 2 * 2 ^ (LENGTH('b) - 1)›
      by (metis One_nat_def decr_length_less_iff less_eq_Suc_le order.refl power.simps(2) verit_la_disequality)
    then show ?thesis
      by linarith
  qed
  by (simp add: int_ops(6),
      smt (verit, best) less_imp_diff_less power_strict_increasing_iff)

lemma [φreason %logical_spec_of_semantics]:
  ‹get_logical_nat_from_semantic_int (n ⦂ ℤ('b::len)) (if 0 ≤ n then nat n else nat (2^LENGTH('b) + n))›
  unfolding get_logical_nat_from_semantic_int_def Ball_def
  by clarsimp

subsubsection ‹Rounded Integers›

subsubsection ‹Rounded Natural Number›

φtype_def φRoundedInt :: "'b::len itself ⇒ (VAL, int) φ"
  where ‹x ⦂ φRoundedInt _ ≡ ((of_int x :: 'b word) ⦂ Word('b))›
  deriving Basic
       and Abstract_Domain⇩L
       and ‹Object_Equiv (φRoundedInt (TY::'b::len itself)) (λx y. x mod 2^LENGTH('b) = y mod 2^LENGTH('b))›
       and ‹ 𝗍𝗒𝗉𝖾𝗈𝖿(φRoundedInt TYPE('a)) = 𝗂𝗇𝗍('a) ›
       and ‹Semantic_Zero_Val int('b) (φRoundedInt TYPE('b)) 0›
       and Inhabited


syntax φRoundedInt_syntax :: "type ⇒ (VAL, nat) φ" ("ℤ⇧r'(_')")

translations "ℤ⇧r('x)" <= "CONST φRoundedInt TYPE('x)"

parse_ast_translation ‹
  let open Ast
   in [(\<^syntax_const>‹φRoundedInt_syntax›, (fn _ => fn [V] =>
          Appl [Constant \<^const_syntax>‹φRoundedInt›,
                Appl [Constant \<^syntax_const>‹_TYPE›, add_sort V]]))] end›

declare [[φreason_default_pattern
      ‹_ ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (φRoundedInt _)› ⇒
      ‹_ ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag to (φRoundedInt _)›    (200)
  and ‹?x ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ φRoundedInt _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫 › ⇒
      ‹?x ⦂ ?T 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ φRoundedInt _ 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫 ›    (200) ]]


declare φRoundedInt.elim[condition ‹Threshold_Cost 7›,
                         φreason %ToA_num_conv for ‹_ ⦂ ℤ⇧r(_) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 _ ⦂ Word(_) 𝗐𝗂𝗍𝗁 _ @tag 𝒯𝒫›]

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹x ⦂ ℤ⇧r('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 y ⦂ Word('b) 𝗌𝗎𝖻𝗃 y. y = (of_int x :: 'b::len word) @tag to Word('b)›
  ❴  ❵.
 
lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹ Threshold_Cost 9
⟹ x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 uint x ⦂ ℤ⇧r('b)›
  for x :: ‹'b::len word›
  ❴ ‹uint x ⦂ MAKE _ (ℤ⇧r('b))› ❵ .

lemma [φreason %ToA_num_conv_cut]:
  ‹ x ⦂ Word('b) 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 uint x ⦂ ℤ⇧r('b) @tag to ℤ⇧r('b)›
  for x :: ‹'b::len word› ❴ ❵.

lemma [φreason 1000]:
  "φEqual (ℤ⇧r('b::len)) (λx y. True) (λx y. x mod 2^LENGTH('b) = y mod 2^LENGTH('b))"
  ❴ to ‹Word('b)› ❵
      certified by (metis the_φlemmata uint_word_of_int word_of_int_uint)   .

definition op_add :: "nat ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_add bits =
      φM_caseV (λvb va.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a.
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_int (bits, ((val_a + val_b) mod 2^bits))))
  )))"

definition op_sub :: "nat ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_sub bits =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_int (bits, ((2^bits + val_a - val_b) mod 2^bits))))
  )))"

definition op_umul :: "nat ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_umul bits =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_int (bits, ((val_a * val_b) mod 2^bits))))
  )))"

definition op_udiv :: "nat ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_udiv bits =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      φM_assert (val_b ≠ 0) ⪢
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_int (bits, (val_a div val_b))))
  )))"

definition op_sdiv :: "'b::len itself ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_sdiv _ =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a::'b word.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b::'b word.
      φM_assert (val_b ≠ 0) ⪢
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b), unat (val_a sdiv val_b))))
  )))"

definition op_umod :: "'b::len itself ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_umod _ =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a::'b word.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b::'b word.
      φM_assert (val_b ≠ 0) ⪢
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b), unat (val_a mod val_b))))
  )))"

definition op_smod :: "'b::len itself ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_smod _ =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a::'b word.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b::'b word.
      φM_assert (val_b ≠ 0) ⪢
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b), unat (val_a smod val_b))))
  )))"

definition op_lshr :: "nat ⇒ nat ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_lshr b_a b_b =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T b_a) (snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T b_b) (snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_int (b_a, (val_a div 2 ^ val_b))))
  )))"

definition op_lshl :: "nat ⇒ nat ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_lshl b_a b_b =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T b_a) (snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T b_b) (snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_int (b_a, (val_a * 2 ^ val_b mod 2^b_a))))
  )))"

definition op_ult :: "nat ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_ult bits =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_bool (val_a < val_b)))
  )))"

definition op_ule :: "nat ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_ule bits =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T bits) (snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_bool (val_a ≤ val_b)))
  )))"

definition op_slt :: "'b::len itself ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_slt _ =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a::'b word.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_bool (val_a <s val_b)))
  )))"

definition op_sle :: "'b::len itself ⇒ (VAL × VAL, VAL) proc'"
  where "op_sle _ =
      φM_caseV (λva vb.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval_a::'b word.
      φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) vb (λval_b.
      Return (φarg (sem_mk_bool (val_a ≤s val_b)))
  )))"


definition op_cast_uint :: ‹'b1::len itself ⇒ 'b2::len itself ⇒ (VAL, VAL) proc'›

    φM_getV (sem_int_T LENGTH('b1)) (of_nat o snd o sem_dest_int) va (λval::'b1 word.

section ‹Abstraction of Instructions›

subsection ‹Arithmetic Operations›

subsubsection ‹Constant Integer›

lemma op_const_word_φapp[φreason %φsynthesis_literal_number]:
  ‹ 𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖿𝗒[mode_literal] n : unat n'
⟹ X 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 n' ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[semantic_literal (sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b),n))] Word('b) 𝗋𝖾𝗆𝖺𝗂𝗇𝗌 X @tag synthesis›
  for X :: assn
❴
  semantic_literal ‹sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b),n) ⊨ (n' ⦂ Word('b))›
❵ .

lemma op_const_nat_φapp[φreason %φsynthesis_literal_number]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 n < 2 ^ LENGTH('b)
⟹ 𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖿𝗒[mode_literal] n' : n
⟹ X 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 n ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[semantic_literal (sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b),n'))] ℕ('b) 𝗋𝖾𝗆𝖺𝗂𝗇𝗌 X @tag synthesis›
  for X :: assn
❴
  semantic_literal ‹sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b),n') ⊨ (n ⦂ ℕ('b))›
  certified by (simp add: φ unat_of_nat_len)
❵ .

lemma op_const_natR_φapp[φreason %φsynthesis_literal_number]:
  ‹ 𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖿𝗒[mode_literal] n' : n mod 2 ^ LENGTH('b)
⟹ X 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 n ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[semantic_literal (sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b),n'))] ℕ⇧r('b) 𝗋𝖾𝗆𝖺𝗂𝗇𝗌 X @tag synthesis›
  for X :: assn
❴
  apply_rule op_const_word[where 'b='b and n=n' and n' = ‹of_nat n›, simplified, OF Simplify_to_Premise]
  certified by (simp add: the_φ(2) unat_of_nat) 
❵ certified by (simp add: unat_of_nat) .

lemma op_const_int_φapp[φreason %φsynthesis_literal_number]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 - (2 ^ (LENGTH('b)-1)) ≤ n ∧ n < 2 ^ (LENGTH('b)-1)
⟹ 𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖿𝗒[mode_literal] n' : (if 0 ≤ n then nat n else nat (2^LENGTH('b) + n))
⟹ X 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 n ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[semantic_literal (sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b),n'))] ℤ('b) 𝗋𝖾𝗆𝖺𝗂𝗇𝗌 X @tag synthesis›
  for X :: assn
❴
  semantic_literal ‹sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b),n') ⊨ (n ⦂ ℤ('b))›
  certified by (simp add: φ unat_of_nat_len)
❵ .

lemma op_const_intR_φapp[φreason %φsynthesis_literal_number]:
  ‹ 𝗌𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝗂𝖿𝗒[mode_literal] n' : (let n = n mod 2 ^ LENGTH('b) in if 0 ≤ n then nat n else nat (2^LENGTH('b) + n))
⟹ X 𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗇𝗌𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝗌 n ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[semantic_literal (sem_mk_int (LENGTH('b),n'))] ℤ⇧r('b) 𝗋𝖾𝗆𝖺𝗂𝗇𝗌 X @tag synthesis›
  for X :: assn
❴
  apply_rule op_const_word[where 'b='b and n=n' and n' = ‹of_int n›, simplified, OF Simplify_to_Premise]
  certified by auto_sledgehammer
❵ certified by auto_sledgehammer .

lemma [φreason %φsynthesis_parse_number
    for ‹Synthesis_Parse (numeral ?n::nat) (?X :: ?'ret ⇒ assn)›
       ‹Synthesis_Parse (1::nat) (?X :: ?'ret ⇒ assn)›
       ‹Synthesis_Parse (0::nat) (?X :: ?'ret ⇒ assn)›
]:
  ‹ Synthesis_Parse (n ⦂ ℕ(𝗂𝗇𝗍)) X
⟹ Synthesis_Parse n X›
  for X :: ‹'ret ⇒ assn›
  unfolding Synthesis_Parse_def ..

subsubsection ‹Addition›
 
lemma op_add_word_φapp[φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                   and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x + y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_add LENGTH('b) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] Word('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x + y ⦂ Word('b) ⦄›
  unfolding op_add_def Premise_def
  by (cases vx; cases vy; simp, rule, rule, simp, rule, simp, rule, simp add: Premise_def unat_word_ariths, presburger)

lemma op_add_nat_φapp[φoverload +,
                      φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                 and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x + y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 x + y < 2 ^ LENGTH('b)
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_add LENGTH('b::len) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℕ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x + y ⦂ ℕ('b) ⦄ ›
  ❴ apply_rule op_add_word[where 'b='b] ❵
      certified using φ by (metis of_nat_add of_nat_inverse) .

lemma op_add_natR_φapp[φoverload +,
                       φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                  and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ⇧r('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ⇧r('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x + y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_add LENGTH('b::len) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℕ⇧r('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℕ⇧r('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x + y ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b) ⦄ ›
  ❴ apply_rule op_add_word[where 'b='b] ❵
      certified by (metis of_nat_add unat_of_nat) .

lemma op_add_int_φapp[φoverload +,
                      φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                 and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x + y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 x + y ∈ {- (2 ^ (LENGTH('b)-1)) ..< 2 ^ (LENGTH('b)-1) }
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_add LENGTH('b::len) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℤ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x + y ⦂ ℤ('b) ⦄ ›
  ❴ apply_rule op_add_word[where 'b='b] ❵
      certified by auto_sledgehammer .
 
lemma op_add_intR_φapp[φoverload +,
                       φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                  and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ⇧r('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ⇧r('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x + y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_add LENGTH('b::len) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℤ⇧r('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℤ⇧r('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x + y ⦂ ℤ⇧r('b) ⦄ ›
  ❴ apply_rule op_add_word[where 'b='b] ❵
      certified by (metis of_int_add uint_word_of_int)  .

declare op_add_word_φapp[φoverload +]


subsubsection ‹Subtraction›

lemma op_sub_word_φapp[φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                   and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x - y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_sub LENGTH('b::len) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] Word('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x - y ⦂ Word('b) ⦄›
  unfolding op_sub_def Premise_def
  by (cases vx; cases vy; simp, rule, rule, simp add: φexpns,
      rule, simp add: φexpns, rule, simp add: φexpns,
      metis (no_types, opaque_lifting) Nat.add_diff_assoc2 add.commute add_0 mod_add_self2 unat_of_nat unat_sub_if' unsigned_0 word_arith_nat_add)

lemma op_sub_nat_φapp[φoverload -,
                      φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                 and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x - y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y ≤ x
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_sub LENGTH('b::len) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℕ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x - y ⦂ ℕ('b) ⦄›
  ❴ apply_rule op_sub_word[where 'b='b] ❵
      certified by (metis of_nat_mono_maybe_le the_φ(3) the_φlemmata(1) the_φlemmata(2) unat_of_nat_eq unat_sub) .

lemma op_sub_natR_φapp[φoverload -,
                       φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                  and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ⇧r('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ⇧r('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x - y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:

⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_sub LENGTH('b::len) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℕ⇧r('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℕ⇧r('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x - y ⦂ ℕ⇧r('b) ⦄›
  ❴ apply_rule op_sub_word[where 'b='b] ❵
      certified by (metis of_nat_diff the_φ unat_of_nat) .

lemma op_sub_int_φapp[φoverload -,
                      φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                 and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x - y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:

subsubsection ‹Multiplication›


lemma op_mul_word_φapp[φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                   and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x * y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_umul LENGTH('b::len) (vx❙, vy)
         ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] Word('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x * y ⦂ Word('b) ⦄›
  unfolding op_umul_def Premise_def
  by (cases vx; cases vy; simp, rule, rule, simp, rule, simp, rule, simp add: unat_word_ariths(2))

lemma op_mul_nat_φapp[φoverload *,
                      φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                 and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x * y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 x * y < 2^LENGTH('b)
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_umul LENGTH('b::len) (vx❙, vy)
         ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℕ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x * y ⦂ ℕ('b) ⦄›
  ❴ apply_rule op_mul_word[where 'b='b] ❵
      certified by (simp add: the_φ(3) unat_eq_of_nat) .

subsubsection ‹Division›

lemma op_udiv_word_φapp[φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                   and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x div y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y ≠ 0
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_udiv LENGTH('b) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] Word('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x div y ⦂ Word('b) ⦄›
  unfolding op_udiv_def Premise_def
  by (cases vx; cases vy; simp, rule, rule, simp, rule, simp, rule,
      rule φM_assert, simp add: unat_gt_0, rule, simp add: unat_div)

lemma op_div_nat_φapp[φoverload /,
                      φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                 and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x div y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y ≠ 0
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_udiv LENGTH('b) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℕ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x div y ⦂ ℕ('b) ⦄›
  ❴ apply_rule op_udiv_word_φapp[where 'b='b]
    certified
    using Word.of_nat_neq_0 the_φ(3) the_φlemmata(2) by blast
  ❵ certified by (simp add: the_φlemmata(1) the_φlemmata(2) of_nat_inverse unat_div) .

declare op_udiv_word_φapp[φoverload /]


lemma op_sdiv_word_φapp[φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                   and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x sdiv y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y ≠ 0
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_sdiv TYPE('b) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] Word('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x sdiv y ⦂ Word('b) ⦄›
  unfolding op_sdiv_def Premise_def
  by (cases vx; cases vy; simp, rule, rule, simp, rule, simp, rule,
        rule φM_assert, simp add: unat_gt_0, rule, simp)

lemma op_div_int_φapp[φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                 and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x sdiv y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 x ≠ - (2 ^ (LENGTH('b) - 1)) ∧ y ≠ 0
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_sdiv TYPE('b) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℤ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x sdiv y ⦂ ℤ('b) ⦄›
  ❴
    op_sdiv_word
    certified using sint_of_int_eq the_φ(5) the_φlemmata(3) the_φlemmata(4) by force
  ❵
    certified unfolding sdiv_word_def
    by (metis One_nat_def sdiv_word_max' sdiv_word_min' sint_int_min sint_of_int_eq the_φ(1) the_φ(3) the_φ(6) the_φlemmata(1) the_φlemmata(3))  .


lemma op_div_int_fail[φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
                                 and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x div y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ FAIL TEXT(‹About integers, there is no rule available for unsigned division› (div)
              ‹Please use the signed› (sdiv)
              ‹Note the C semantics is› (sdiv) ‹instead of› (div)
              ‹and they are different in negative numbers›)
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 fail ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℤ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x div y ⦂ ℤ('b) ⦄›
  unfolding FAIL_def
  by blast

subsubsection ‹Modulo›

lemma op_umod_word_φapp
  [φoverload %,
   φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
              and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x mod y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y ≠ 0
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_umod TYPE('b) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] Word('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x mod y ⦂ Word('b) ⦄›
  unfolding op_umod_def Premise_def
  by (cases vx; cases vy; simp, rule, rule, simp, rule, simp, rule,
      rule φM_assert, simp add: unat_gt_0, rule, simp add: unat_div)

lemma op_mod_nat_φapp
  [φoverload %,
   φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
              and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x mod y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y ≠ 0
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_umod TYPE('b) (vx❙, vy)
      ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℕ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℕ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x mod y ⦂ ℕ('b) ⦄›
  ❴    
    op_umod_word certified using Word.of_nat_neq_0 the_φ(3) the_φlemmata(2) by blast
  ❵
    certified by (simp add: of_nat_inverse the_φlemmata(1) the_φlemmata(2) unat_mod_distrib) .

lemma op_smod_word_φapp
  [φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
              and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('b)› ⇒ ‹λ v. x smod y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y ≠ 0
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_smod TYPE('b) (vx❙, vy) ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] Word('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] Word('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x smod y ⦂ Word('b) ⦄›
  unfolding op_smod_def Premise_def
  by (cases vx; cases vy; simp, rule, rule, simp, rule, simp, rule,
      rule φM_assert, simp add: unat_gt_0, rule, simp add: unat_div)

lemma op_mod_int_φapp
  [φoverload %,
   φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
              and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('b)› ⇒ ‹λv. x smod y ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  ‹ 𝗉𝗋𝖾𝗆𝗂𝗌𝖾 y ≠ 0
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_smod TYPE('b) (vx❙, vy)
      ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℤ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x smod y ⦂ ℤ('b) ⦄›
  ❴ 
    op_smod_word certified using sint_of_int_eq the_φ(5) the_φlemmata(3) the_φlemmata(4) by fastforce
  ❵ 
  certified
    by (metis One_nat_def signed_take_bit_int_eq_self sint_sbintrunc' smod_word_def smod_word_max smod_word_min the_φ(1) the_φlemmata(1) the_φlemmata(2) the_φlemmata(3))  .

lemma op_mod_int_fail[φsynthesis %synthesis_arith_cut]:
  ‹ FAIL TEXT(‹About integers, there is no rule available for unsigned modulo› (mod)
              ‹Please use the signed› (smod)
              ‹Note in C semantics it is› (smod) ‹instead of› (mod)
              ‹and they are different in negative numbers›)
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 fail ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vx] ℤ('b)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[vy] ℤ('b) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 x mod y ⦂ ℤ('b) ⦄›
  unfolding FAIL_def
  by blast

lemma op_lshr_word_pre_φapp:
  ‹𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_lshr LENGTH('ba) LENGTH('bb) (v1❙, v2)
        ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[v1] Word('ba) ❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[v2] Word('bb) ⟼ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 drop_bit (unat y) x ⦂ Word('ba) ⦄›
  unfolding op_lshr_def
  by (cases v1; cases v2; simp; rule, rule, simp, rule, simp, rule, simp,
      metis drop_bit_eq_div unat_drop_bit_eq)

lemma drop_bit_nat_le:
  ‹drop_bit n x ≤ x› for x :: nat
  using div_le_dividend drop_bit_nat_def by presburger

proc op_lshr_int
  [φsynthesis %synthesis_arith for _
              and ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('ba) ❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('bb)› ⇒ ‹λv. drop_bit y x ⦂ _› (%synthesis_arith_cut)]:
  input ‹x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[v1] ℤ('ba)❟ y ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[v2] ℕ('bb)›
  premises ‹0 ≤ x›
  output ‹𝗏𝖺𝗅 drop_bit y x ⦂ ℤ('ba)›
❴
  apply_rule op_lshr_nat_φapp[where 'ba='ba and 'bb='bb]
❵ .

     ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[v] Word('ba) ⟼ Word.cast x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 Word('bb) ⦄›

  by (cases v, simp, rule, simp, rule, simp)

lemma op_cast_nat_φapp:
  ‹𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_cast_uint TYPE('ba) TYPE('bb) v
     ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[v] ℕ('ba) ⟼ take_bit LENGTH('bb) x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('bb) ⦄›
  ❴ apply_rule op_cast_uint_word[where 'bb='bb] ❵
      certified by (simp add: of_nat_inverse the_φlemmata unsigned_ucast_eq) .

  ‹𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_cast_int TYPE('ba) TYPE('bb) v

     ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[v] ℤ('ba) ⟼ signed_take_bit (LENGTH('bb)-1) x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('bb) ⦄›

lemma op_upcast_nat_φapp:
  ‹ 𝖼𝗈𝗇𝖽𝗂𝗍𝗂𝗈𝗇 LENGTH('ba) ≤ LENGTH('bb)
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_cast_uint TYPE('ba) TYPE('bb) v
     ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[v] ℕ('ba) ⟼ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℕ('bb) ⦄›
  ❴ have [useful]: ‹x < 2 ^ LENGTH('ba)› using φ by blast
  ;; apply_rule op_cast_nat[where 'bb='bb] ($v) ❵
      certified by auto_sledgehammer .

lemma op_upcast_int_φapp:
  ‹ 𝖼𝗈𝗇𝖽𝗂𝗍𝗂𝗈𝗇 LENGTH('ba) ≤ LENGTH('bb)
⟹ 𝗉𝗋𝗈𝖼 op_cast_int TYPE('ba) TYPE('bb) v
     ⦃ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅[v] ℤ('ba) ⟼ x ⦂ 𝗏𝖺𝗅 ℤ('bb) ⦄›
  ❴ apply_rule op_cast_int_word[where 'bb='bb] ❵
      certified by (simp add: is_up.rep_eq sint_of_int_eq sint_up_scast the_φ(1) the_φ(3) the_φlemmata(1)) .
